REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1715 reute u f BC-SYNALLOY-<SYO>-ENDS-P 03-25 0047

TEXT.TITLE: SYNALLOY <SYO> ENDS PLANS TO SELL UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Synalloy Corp said it has ended talks on the sale of its Blackman Uhler Chemical Division to Intex Products Inc because agreement could not be reached. The company said it does not intend to seek another buyer. Reuter
